Title: On the tip of Orange Isle
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Orange Isle, an isle in the Xiang River near Changsha, Hunan Province, has been immortalized in a 1925 poem by Mao Zedong entitled "Changsha (to the tune of Qinyuanchun)". The English version of the poem can be found here; the Chinese version is here.
